verses.verse: A song of David for going up to the Temple. LORD, I don’t feel proud. I don’t see myself as better than others. I am not thinking about doing great things or reaching impossible goals.

No, right now I am calm and quiet, like a child after nursing, content in its mother’s arms. (like a child … arms Or “like a baby on its mother’s back, like a baby on my back, so is my soul.” The metaphor may refer to the custom of a working mother tying her baby on her back after nursing.)
Israel, trust in the LORD. Trust in him now and forever!
